name: Avanqua Oceanografic S.L.
goal:
To make available to the greatest possible number of people the wonders of the marine world, as an optimal tool
for raising public awareness in order to generate changes in attitude towards sustainability, also promoting,
together with the Oceanogràfic Foundation, scientific research programs, conservation of biodiversity and global
disclosure, also fostering in our organization the best and most effective management practices.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: All related to ocean conservation innitiatives and legislation of leisure complexes such as zoos and aquariums.
